vlive.korean: 진짜 다들 손 깨끗이 씻고 마스크 필수 아시죠? Make sure to wash your hands and use a mask. You know it, right? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 안뇽🦋
vlive.english: Make sure to wash your hands and use a mask. You know it, right?

vlive.korean: 보이는 곳만 깨끗이! Clean only in the parts that show! 듣기 View video BTOB : 육성재 (YOOK SUNGJAE) - 'CHICKEN'이 되고 싶은 6성재의 성장기
vlive.english: Clean only in the parts that show!

vlive.korean: [깨끗이 닦아서 보관해주세요!] 취미니까! [Please store them in a clean state] But it's just a hobby! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 동명의 캔버스그림🎨 (HOW TO PAINT DONGMYEONG’s Canvas Drawing)
vlive.english: [Please store them in a clean state] But it's just a hobby!

vlive.korean: "안경 닦이로 닦으면 깨끗이 지워진다고..." "It gets clean if you use the cloth that you use to clean eyeglasses with". 듣기 View video NCT : 💚HAPPYJAEMINDAY💚
vlive.english: "It gets clean if you use the cloth that you use to clean eyeglasses with".

vlive.korean: 깨끗이 이런 건 다 맞았어. He got all those right. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : [펜타곤 교과서 시즌5] EP. 1 - 발표 시간

examples.korean: The showroom had been emptied and swept clean. 발음듣기 상품 전시실은 텅 빈 채 깨끗이 청소되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The showroom had been emptied and swept clean. 발음

examples.korean: The kids had scraped their plates clean. 발음듣기 아이들이 (음식 찌꺼기가 남아 있지 않도록) 접시를 깨끗이 긁어 놓았었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The kids had scraped their plates clean. 발음

examples.korean: to groom a horse / dog / cat 발음듣기 말/개/고양이의 몸을 깨끗이 해 주다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to groom a horse / dog / cat 발음

examples.korean: The dogs picked the bones clean. 발음듣기 개들은 그 뼈다귀들을 깨끗이 핥아 먹었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The dogs picked the bones clean. 발음

examples.korean: She licked the spoon clean. 발음듣기 그녀는 숟가락을 깨끗이 핥았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She licked the spoon clean. 발음
